Package package1

Class FYPCoordinator

java.lang.Object
package1.Supervisor
package1.FYPCoordinator
public class FYPCoordinator extends Supervisor
Child Class of Supervisor that used to represent a FYPCoordinator (because a FYPCoordinator is a supervisor)

  • Constructor Details

    • FYPCoordinator

      public FYPCoordinator(String userID, String password, String name, String email)
      Constructs a new FYPCoordinator object with the given user ID, password, name, and email. Adds the new coordinator to the coordinator list.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID of the new coordinator
      password - the password of the new coordinator
      name - the name of the new coordinator
      email - the email of the new coordinator

  • Method Details

    • createFYPCoordinator

      public static FYPCoordinator createFYPCoordinator(String userID, String password, String name, String email)
      Creates a new FYPCoordinator object with the given user ID, password, name, and email. Checks if the given user ID already exists in the system before creating the new coordinator.
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID of the new coordinator
      password - the password of the new coordinator
      name - the name of the new coordinator
      email - the email of the new coordinator
      Returns:
      a new FYPCoordinator object if the given user ID does not already exist, otherwise null

      Parameters:
      userID - the userID of the FYPCoordinator to log in
      password - the password of the FYPCoordinator to log in
      Returns:
      1 if the login was successful, 0 if the login failed due to incorrect password, or -1 if the user does not exist
